channel.title: Peoples cant log in?
channel.description:
Hello moparscape members, i need help with my PI server, im using Cleaned Pi.
Peoples cant log in to my server, i changed all IPS at client. "error connecting to server"
I can log in, but another person cant.
On another server all can log in and play. This problem is only with this clen pi, maybe its port problems?

item.title: Peoples cant log in?
item.dc:creator: @Skrillex_Craft Skrillex_Craft
item.description:
@Skrillex_Craft wrote:

[quote=“f3rsport, post:1, topic:536417”]Hello moparscape members, i need help with my PI server, im using Cleaned Pi.

Peoples cant log in to my server, i changed all IPS at client.
“error connecting to server”

I can log in, but another person cant.

On another server all can log in and play. This problem is only with this clen pi, maybe its port problems?[/quote]First of all what ip are you using? 2nd what are the ports you are using? 3rd is your host actually giving acces to run the server?

Read full topic
